item.title: Gold just stumbled. A JPMorgan strategist says the metal could double in value.
item.description: JPMorgan believes gold will increasingly become an investor favored hedge against equities, to the tune of 110%.

item.title: Ford has a secret weapon that could help its earnings as EV concerns swirl
item.description: Ford sold a record number of hybrid vehicles in the third quarter. Still, it will have a high bar to clear after GM boosted profit expectations for th...

item.title: I received an inheritance from my father’s estate, but the executor wants me to give it back. What should I do?
item.description: You are not responsible for the executor’s mismanagement of your father’s estate.

item.title: Social Security’s COLA is coming. Here’s how you can stretch your benefits the most.
item.description: The cost-of-living adjustment could be as high as 2.8% for 2026.

item.title: Volvo Car shares enjoying best day since going public
item.description: Volvo Car shares were surging by the most in the four years it’s been public as the Swedish automaker’s cost-cutting surprised investors.
